text: Ni We wabaremye abakomoye mu gitaka, hanyuma mu ntanga, hanyuma mu rusoro rwâ€™amaraso, hanyuma abasohora (muri nyababyeyi) muri impinja, kugira ngo mugere ku bukure mu bwenge no mu gihagararo, hanyuma mube abasaza. No muri mwe harimo abapfa mbere, (Allah abikora gutyo) kugira ngo muzageze ku gihe cyagenwe, ngo wenda mwagira ubwenge
